Articles.Content: I request a mod that lets you do two things: one: change a Kerbal's boyuancy in the water, and two: use the jetpack under water. I want to plant a flag under da sea, dangit! :P

[quote name='GregroxMun']I request a mod that lets you do two things: one: change a Kerbal's boyuancy in the water, and two: use the jetpack under water. I want to plant a flag under da sea, dangit! :P[/QUOTE]
This could be done with KIS... Let me take a look at it.
